result.eng: Could you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ga: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.orig: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.html: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh domCould you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá cupán bainne a ṫéaṁ domCould you warm me a cup of milk?

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: Fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: If you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ga: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.orig: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.html: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ponchtml: Mura ḃfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.

result.eng: It is not very warm in the bedroom.
result.ga: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapa
result.orig: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapa
result.html: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapaIt is not very warm in the bedroom.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapaIt is not very warm in the bedroom.

result.html: Tá sé te inniuIt is warm today.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé te inniuIt is warm today.

result.eng: One week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ga: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.orig: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.html: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seaċtain aṁáin deas te aċ ḃí an dara seaċtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
